duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide exceptional customer service to donors, ensuring their safety and well-being during the plasma donation process.
Screen new and repeat donors, record vital signs, and maintain accurate medical records.
Identify and initiate operational improvements to enhance the efficiency of plasma center processes.
Work in a fast-paced, team environment, maintaining a clean and professional workspace while problem-solving with the management team.
Learn and perform phlebotomy procedures, including operating and troubleshooting plasmapheresis machines.
